solution_line_template: Lana sold {sold_morning} muffins and has to sell {total_goal} - {sold_morning} = {remaining_after_morning} to hit her goal before the bake sale ends.

When she sells another {sold_afternoon} in the afternoon Lana has {remaining_after_morning} - {sold_afternoon} = <<{remaining_after_morning}-{sold_afternoon}={remaining_after_afternoon}>>{remaining_after_afternoon} muffins left to sell to meet her target.
